page.title: 19INDUSTRY3 Kirmington/Croxton
page.content:
GLOBE PALM. A small family business relocated from Selby to Kirmington in 1981 because of the good road network and location near the ports. It employes 10 drivers and a secretary.It's 10 lorries are employed in international haulage,delivering as far as the Artic circle & Sicily. SMALL BUSINESSES: AUTOLEC:At the old forge Kirmington, husband and wife business repairing and maintaining electrics on machinery and vehicles. JOINER & UNDERTAKER: 2 men and 1 apprentice, operating from Kirmington village.They work within 15 miles of home and do much work for Humberside Airport and Singleton Birch Quarry. SHOP & SUB POST OFFICE: Husband and wife team,sell a range of goods.
Page 20, jobs. Page 16, the Pub.
